comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: Caption is "Mrs. Admiral Eaton" This appears to be Mrs. Jennie May Eaton who was accused of the murder of her husband Rear Admiral Joseph G. Eaton. She stood trial in October 1913 in Plymouth, Mass. (ref. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9C07E7DF173DE633A... ) There is some further information in comments at the adjacent photograph here: www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3201072023/in/p... Interestingly, this is not a photograph but a portrait drawing.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: lifeasdaddy, thank you for this information! We will clarify the name in the source data and reload the description.
